biotools.summary: It is a reaction similarity calculation tool that enables calculation of reaction similarity with multitude of parameters. Specific approach of computing reaction similarity is not efficient to find the most appropriate solution of interest. To enable the user to tune the similarity calculations with different parameters, there by analyzing different solutions will help in finding most appropriate solution.

bioschemas.name: SimCAL
